TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Evaristo_Carvalho, title = Evaristo_Carvalho, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evaristo_Carvalho} }

S.FORM: I 1941 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 22 a romi'ad masofoc ci Evaristo Carvalho , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Sao tome and principe anini i ci Evaristo Carvalho, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 3 a romi'ad.

I 1941 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 22 a romi'ad masofoc ci Evaristo Carvalho , malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Sao tome and principe anini i ci Evaristo Carvalho, patirengan a romi'ad i 2016 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 3 a romi'ad.
